body: Try `htop` on terminal to see if CPU is a bottleneck (should show 100% usage on all CPUs). If it is, restart training with prefix `OMP_NUM_THREADS=1` and then python3 etc.
@george-roussos thanks george. I will try and let you know.

@george-roussos Hi George, may i ask whether this horizontal line is normal ?
![Screenshot 2020-11-17 at 5 03 07 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11624203/99368996-d412cd80-28f6-11eb-9afd-55f63185f73e.png)
Hi, this will go away gradually 🙂 Let us know what results you get!
